title: Code Grey: ethical dilemmas in nursing: four cases (TEFC)
creator_credit: Joan Sawyer, Video Foundation and Boston Film
brief_description: Discusses the difficulties and enormous responsibilities which nurses face when making decisions which affect the lives of their patients.
